name: My Little Dark Lord
description:
Description:

You play as Garius the Corrupted, a dark lord on a quest to restore his place as the top demon in the realm after making an unfortunate accident and saving an innocent. Your main goal is to prove to the world that you are the most evil dark lord that has ever existed. Fight through swarms of monsters through an ever changing hellscape with the only constants being the items you collect along the way.

Controls:

Combat:

M1 (Left Click) - Weak Melee Attack

M2 (Right Click) - Block

Tab - Lock on

Movement:

W/A/S/D - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

C - Crouch

Q - Roll

Environment:

E - Action

U - Use Item

I - Inventory
